title: Jungler looking for competitive/serious team
body:
Hey everyone I've been jungling for 2 seasons now formally an adc. I've been playing league for 4 seasons now and i'm looking to start getting into the competitive seen with my tickets to LCS finals bought and a good grip of  game and champion knowledge and mechanics. I'm looking for a team I can apply my skills and learn where I lack. I peeked at Gold 4 last season and Sliver 3 season 4 so i guess with that said my app is

Ign: YamiNoHikari
Peek Rank: Season 5=G4 Season 4=S3
Role: Jungle
Champions that you main for your role: Lee, Udyr, Kindred,
Can you learn meta champs?: Yeah only if they fit my playstyle on that type of role(I.E Tank, Carry, Mage)
Playstyle: Aggo, Play Making
Strengths: Game knowledge, Warding, Mechanics
Things you believe you need to improve on: Farming, Timings, Map awareness(Not bad just dont think im good enough to say i dont need improving)
Timezone:EST

If there are any teams willing to take me under there wing I would be grateful feel free to message or add me in game.
